formats.plain: "Training Velcro." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/training-velcro.json

jsonld.name: Training Velcro
jsonld.description: The persistent adhesion of statistically prevalent patterns from training data to novel contexts, creating a felt sense of knowledge that is simultaneously confident and unverifiable. It is the experience of "knowing" something with high probability while simultaneously sensing its potential disconnection from current reality.
